metadata.title: Portfolio Emenella
metadata.description: Discover the portfolio of emenella, a passionate fullstack web developer specializing in the creation of modern web applications. Explore my projects, skills and professional experience implemented with Next.js, React, Node.js and Fastify.

homepage.description: Innovative coder from Arles, inspired by Van Gogh, shaping a new vision of the digital future.

skills.title: Node.js

skills.description: Bun is a simple and fast HTTP router for Node.js.

skills.title: Nest.js
skills.description: A progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, reliable and scalable server-side applications.

skills.title: Fastify
skills.description: Fastify is a web framework highly focused on providing the best developer experience with the least overhead and a powerful plugin architecture.

skills.title: Express
skills.description: Fast, unopinionated, minimalist web framework for Node.js
